Articles.Content: I have a late 2007 iMac running OS X Lion, or 10.7.5. It has 4 gbs of ram. I have ksp's graphics and everything else on the lowest quality. How can I make it run better because it runs like crap.
Hi, and welcome to the forum, @qcan0312! Something that really helps for me is to change to the lowest possible screen resolution in 4:3 - makes a really big difference (at least in Windowed mode)

@qcan0312 are you sure your system meets/comes close to the minimum system requirements? I have an early 2009 Macbook that comes up short on video RAM (integrated chip ) and runs KSP very slowly. So while it's certainly possible to run the game with a lower spec machine than the stated minimum, with the best will in the world it's going to be very hard to squeeze 'good' performance out of it for that self-evident reason.
I would just like to assure everyone that I'm still here and that qcan0312 is not a reincarnation.
